name: masked-ai (cado-security)
description: [项目级] Masked Python SDK wrapper for OpenAI API. Use public LLM APIs securely.。来源: https://github.com/cado-security/masked-ai

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Masked Python SDK wrapper for OpenAI API. Use public LLM APIs securely.

来源: https://github.com/cado-security/masked-ai
语言: Python
Stars: 120

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
LICENSE
README.md

ci/mypy.cfg

docs/actions_screenshot.png

release/generate_windows_binary.bat
release/upload_pip.sh

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content: You can deploy Masked-AI straight from pip ("pip3 install masked-ai") or from our GitHub repo ("python3 setup.py install"). It can be used as both a python library or over the CLI.

name: masked-ai/release 模块
description: [模块级] masked-ai 项目的 release 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/cado-security/masked-ai

genes.title: release 模块说明
genes.content:
1. Go to the Repo's Releases page (https://github.com/cado-security/masked-ai/releases) - and click "Draft a new release"
2. Make the tag and the name of the release follow the following format: [Major].[Minor].[Patch] (i.e. 1.0.0)
3. Add release notes to the description and click "Publish Release"
4. This will kick off a GitHub Action Workflow named `publish.yml` with 4 steps: Linux, Windows, MacOS and Pypi
5. The PyPi stage will automatically upload package, but for the CLI tools you'd need to
